name: slick rick babies
description:
I'm typically not into high gloss but this came out really gorgeous. It so super slick! It's like glass. I don't know what else to say. ..other than I did lick it once when it came out of the kiln. It's been washed thoroughly since and is ready for your home.

The piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Slip cast from stoneware and fired to cone 6. Glazed inside and out.

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $520

name: lit punk #1
description:
Slipcast then hand-altered from ultra white fine porcelain, this bottle turned candle-luminaire is made with love and a punk-rock spirit. 

Perfect for adding a sophisticated, punk-rock twinkle anywhere in the home. The entire piece is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's luminescence. Because the high-firing vitrifies the material, this piece wipes clean easily. 


Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $110

name: tough guy bowl medium
description:
When I look at this bowl, I imagine a sea urchin and a greaser (marlboro pack rolled in his sleeve/ smells of a petrochemical, etc.) get together and voila... their love child.

Wheel thrown with speckled clay and smothered with a delicious and glossy robin's egg blue. Each dollop of porcelain was tediously applied. 

A pretty display piece that's perfect for fruit or as a serving dish at meals. 

Dimensions: 7.75" in diameter x 3.75" high

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $155

name: double sided doll face
description:
Conception of this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Each piece is then slip cast from ultra-white fine porcelain. The details are painted on before the final high firing. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. 

This vessel is double sided. One side has a single delicately painted doll face while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel. 

This is an ongoing series and exploration. Contact me if you would like a specific design. I'm currently working on pop icons using glazes and decals. Stay tuned! 

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers or greens.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches

Price: $580

name: Vintage erotica
description:
Mee-ooww. 

Slip cast from stoneware and triple fired. Clear glaze inside. The image is iron oxide that becomes one with the clay body during the final firing. She's permanent folks. Keep it away from the kids! ... or wait, it's a human body... Show it to the kids! And then take away their guns.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.75 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $155

name: Thanks Einstein
description:
No really, thank you! This is one of my favorite quotes.

“Everything is energy and that’s all there is to it. Match the frequency of the reality you want and you cannot help but get that reality. It can be no other way. This is not philosophy. This is physics.”  – Albert Einstein

Slipcast from ultra white fine porcelain. One side has the quote that is burned into the glaze on the final firing. It's permanent and will not scratch off. The other side is a hand print that's peeking through ribbons of creamy-white glaze. The interior is glazed entirely.

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $165

name: vintage erotica #2
description:
...maybe she left her shirt up there?

Slip cast from stoneware and triple fired. Clear glaze inside. The image is iron oxide that becomes one with the clay body during the final firing. She's permanent folks. Keep it away from the kids! ... or wait, it's a human body... Show it to the kids! And then take away their guns.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.75 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $155

name: Wooden ships bottle
description:
...on the water; very free... 

Slip cast from stoneware and triple fired. Clear glaze inside. The image is iron oxide that becomes one with the clay body during the final firing. Absolutely permanent.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.75 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $155

name: Rectangle top bowie
description:
Conception of this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Each piece is then slip cast from ultra-white fine porcelain. The details are painted before the final high firing. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. 

This vessel is double sided. One side has a single painted David Bowie face while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel.

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers or greens.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $540

name: Rectangle top bowie 2
description:
Conception of this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Each piece is then slip cast from ultra-white fine porcelain. The details are painted before the final high firing. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. 

This vessel is double sided. One side has a single painted David Bowie face while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel.

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers or greens.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $540

name: winged
description:
This is a drawing I made that is burned into a bottle that was slip cast with two shades of porcelain. Both sides are interesting and beautiful. The entrancing liquid-pour pattern is an effect caused by swirling together the different porcelains at precise moments during the casting process.

Triple fired. Clear glaze inside. The image is iron oxide that becomes one with the clay body during the final firing. It's totally permanent and will not scratch off. 

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $165

name: David Bowie in satin
description:
It's as if he stepped right off a photo shoot from the 70's. Here, David is draped in a creamy satin glaze. Magnifique!

Conception of this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Each piece is then slip cast. The details are painted before the final high firing.

This vessel is double sided. One side has a single painted David Bowie face while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel.

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers or greens.

Dimensions: 11.75 x 4.5 x 6.25 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $540

name: tied with twine
description:
Slip cast from stoneware then wrapped tight with twine. Glazed in a satin white. There's a strong opportunity here for some sort of pun or what-have-you ... but I need to get to the studio and actually make some stuff... I mean I'm a ceramicist for god's sake.

A beautiful gift. Perfect for sake.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.75 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $140

name: lace hole
description:
Slip cast from stoneware then draped with lace and glazed in a satin white. What a purty little number. 

A beautiful gift. Perfect for sake.

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.75 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $140

name: cray
description:
Is she going to run off the road? Or perhaps she's after a villain! I like to think she's trying to stay the course even though the road gets bumpy sometimes. Yea, that's my interpretation.

Slip cast from porcelain and triple fired. White glaze inside. The image is iron oxide that becomes one with the clay body during the final firing. She ain't going nowhere. Put her next to your alarm clock so your mornings are a reminder to stay your course :) 

Food and dishwasher safe. 

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $155

name: tired texter massage mugs
description:
ooooooooooyyyeeeeeaaaa. Your thumbs need some of this. Especial if you've engaged in a thumb war as of late or have been working from "home" all day. And by that I mean drafting emails from the beach. Also perfect for the man-child who plays a lot of PS5.

Wheel-thrown dark-brown speckled clay with porcelain embellishments and drips. Blue-green glaze inside. The two "massage nubs" are placed perfectly to hit the fleshy pad of the thumb. Feels so good... truth.

Food / microwave / dishwasher safe

Measurements: 3.5" high x 3" diameter 

$70 for the set

name: tough guy tumblers
description:
Holding these kinks have been likened to a playful slap with a riding crop on the ol' biscuit. 

Wheel thrown with speckled clay and smothered with a delicious and glossy robin's egg blue. Each dollop of porcelain was tediously applied. 

Dimensions: each is approx. 3.25" in diameter x 3.75" high

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $180 for 6

Contact me if you prefer a smaller order.

name: tough guy bowl large
description:
This bowl features 125 ways to tickle your palm. And ooooo it feels good. 
Wheel thrown with speckled clay and smothered with a delicious and glossy robin's egg blue. Each dollop of porcelain was tediously applied. 

A pretty display piece that's perfect for fruit or as a serving dish at meals. 

Dimensions: 8" in diameter x 4.25" high

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $165

name: deep spin bowl
description:
Half porcelain and half speckled clay. In the ceramics world that's like leather and lace. It's a lot like these lyrics:

Lovers forever
Face to face
My city or mountains
Stay with me stay
I need you to love me
I need you today
Give to me your leather
Take from me
My lace

A seriously beautiful bowl that's perfect for displaying fruit, mixing batter or holding all three volumes of "50 Shades of Grey".

Dimensions: 8" in diameter x 5.75" high

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $135

name: vanilla drip vase
description:
Yummy 3-dimentional drips of porcelain cover this wheel-thrown vase. The body is a mixture of porcelain and speckled clay that was wedged together and you can see the spiral effect from the throwing process. Weighted enough so this delicacy remains steady when displaying flora. Don't you just want to lick it?

Dimensions: 7.25" in diameter x 7.75" high

Price: $210

name: topographic vase
description:
Wheel-thrown in 2 parts. Assembled while leather-hard making a shape that is air-tight. Paddled with a wooden spoon to distort the shape (truth). Then carved. Holy sh*t this took FOREVER. The debossed areas are glazed bright white and the whole piece is covered with a clear crackle gloss. At this price it's a steal! You'll feel the love when you hold it. 

Dimensions: approx. 4.5 x 7.5"

Price: $230

name: babies everywhere! vase
description:
This crazy number was inspired by a commercial http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6rE0EakhG8

But seriously, this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Then ultra-white fine porcelain is slip cast, the triple-apature top is created and it's high-fired to cone 6. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel. This vessel is double sided with babies everywhere! 

This is an ongoing series and exploration. Contact me if you would like a specific design. I'm currently working on pop icons using glazes and decals. Stay tuned! 

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $570

name: stumble #1
description:
Slipcast then hand-distorted from ultra white fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed matte-white. Exterior hair-line cracks from the distortion process add to the character but does not compromise the vessel's ability to hold liquid. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $130

name: stumble #2
description:
Slipcast then hand-distorted from ultra white fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed matte-white. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design..

Measurements: 8.25 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $160

name: double sided david bowie
description:
Conception of this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Each piece is then slip cast from ultra-white fine porcelain. The details are painted before the final high firing. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. 

This vessel is double sided. One side has a single painted "ziggy stardust" face while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel.

This is an ongoing series and exploration. Contact me if you would like a specific design. I'm currently working on pop icons using glazes and decals. Stay tuned!

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $570

name: triple trouble cups
description:
Are you a reeeally nice person? Then these cups can help balance your style. Because these cups don't give a sh*t. They're tougher than a two dollar steak. And you'll feel tough just drinking out of them. Just look at that bad-ass porcelain work. Grrrr.

Wheel-thrown in stoneware with grey and white porcelain embellishments. Toss in your favorite grain alcohol and punch a wall for no reason. Also lovely for morning juices and teas.

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Dimensions (smallest to largest): 2.75 x 4.25" / 2.875 x 4.375" / 2.75 x 4.5" 

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $90 for all 3

name: gimme #1
description:
Slipcast from ultra white fine porcelain, bottles in the Gimme collection are marked by a free-form glazing technique. The exterior shows the raw porcelain body peeking through ribbons of creamy-white glaze. The interior is glazed entirely.

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $150

name: non-slip tumbler
description:
This special tumbler was wheel-thrown with speckle clay. Then each dollop was placed with a squeeze bottle of porcelain slip.  If you look close, each dollop looks like boob! I mean, who doesn't like boobs? Not to mention, this sweet baby feels AMAZING in the hand... no pun intended. And of course, with all that texture, it's almost guaranteed to never slip from you grip. 

Use for you favorite liquid (obvs).

And as always, please contact me if you would like to special order this design as a set or in different colors /sizes.

Dimensions: 3 x 4.25"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $40

name: spinroom #1
description:
Slipcast from fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The entrancing liquid-pour pattern is an effect caused by swirling together white and grey-tinted porcelain at precise moments during the casting process. Each one is a surprise and I truly love making them! The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed clear gloss. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $150

name: Custom designed bottle
description:
Customize your own one-of-a-kind porcelain bottle! This example was created for Nikole and Lance's wedding. The bottle is slipcast from ultra-white porcelain and the design is hand-drawn with a glaze pencil. Colors are fully customizable. Simply email me with your request and I can send you back a design for your approval. Or design your own for me to copy. 

Monotone photographs and graphics can also be transferred to the surface with beautiful results. See my pendants for examples.

Makes an amazing gift!

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $240

name: hoitytoity nesting plates
description:
These thin beauties are hand-built from dark brown stoneware then tediously inlaid with grey and white porcelain. Riverside-white glaze pools in the middle. Sold as a set of 3, with each plate slightly smaller. Charmingly irregular.

These plates should ONLY hold caviar or Italian white alba truffles. Anything less would be uncivilized. 

Dimensions: From largest to smallest - 7.25" / 7" / 6.75" diameters  

Food safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $180

name: spinroom #5
description:
Slipcast from fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The entrancing liquid-pour pattern is an effect caused by swirling together white and grey-tinted porcelain at precise moments during the casting process. Each one is a surprise and I truly love making them! The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed a clear gloss. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $150

name: babies everywhere! artists proof
description:
One of the first castings, this "artists proof" has a few imperfections and is therefore available at a lower cost to you! All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel. This one in particular has a few more. You can see them in the photos.

Conception began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Then ultra-white fine porcelain is slip cast, the triple-apature top is created and it's high-fired to cone 6. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. This vessel is double sided with babies everywhere! 

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $300

name: babies everywhere! vase #3
description:
This crazy number was inspired by a commercial http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6rE0EakhG8

But seriously, this piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Then ultra-white fine porcelain is slip cast, the triple-apature top is created and it's high-fired to cone 6. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel. This vessel is double sided with babies everywhere! 

This is an ongoing series and exploration. Contact me if you would like a specific design. I'm currently working on pop icons using glazes and decals. Stay tuned! 

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $570

name: 80's splashdown cups
description:
These cups have layers... Wheel-thown stoneware is then painted with dark grey porcelain. White porcelain is then splashed over each cup. Glazed white on the inside and clear gloss on the outside. Totally tubular.

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Dimensions: 3 x 4" / 2.25 x 4.5" / 3.25 x 5.25"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $95 for all three

name: sea urchin nesting plates #1
description:
Inspired by the ocean, this set of 3 graduated nesting plates are hand formed with porcelain then pressed with the exoskeleton of a sea urchin from the Indian Ocean. Glazed clear over a watery-blue that fills the pressed pattern.

Give these beauties to someone who loves the ocean like I do or use them for tapas, fruits, nuts, or desserts. 

Please inquire if you'd like a larger quantity or varying sizes / colors.

Dimensions: From largest to smallest - 8" / 7" / 6.5" diameters 

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $130

name: roughed up bud vases
description:
This set of bottle forms were wheel-thrown from dark brown clay, slightly distorted then painted with porcelain. A band of shinny white glaze runs around each bottle at different heights. Clear glaze coats the interiors. 

Display them in a group or separately.

Dimensions: 6.5 x 5" , 6.75 x 5" , 7 x 5"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $120

name: box head pendant 1
description:
Hand-shaped fine porcelain was high fired making this pendant particularly strong. I then printed a vintage photograph from the late 50's with a special iron-oxide ink. The piece then went through its final firing which melted the iron into the white glaze. The design is absolutely permanent and will never scratch off. 

Shipped with a copper jump-ring and a 30" chain. Contact me if you would prefer a shorter chain with a clasp or any other option / embellishment. 

I can also customize your pendant! (See the "customizable" section of this website for more info.) You send me any image and I'll fire it on your choice of pendant. I can alternatively design one for you. I love making these and would love to make yours!

Price: $90

name: box head pendant 2
description:
Hand-shaped fine porcelain was high fired making this pendant particularly strong. I then printed a vintage photograph from the late 50's with a special iron-oxide ink. The piece then went through its final firing which melted the iron into the white glaze. The design is absolutely permanent and will never scratch off. 

Shipped with a copper jump-ring and a 30" chain. Contact me if you would prefer a shorter chain with a clasp or any other option / embellishment. 

I can also customize your pendant! (See the "customizable" section of this website for more info.) You send me any image and I'll fire it on your choice of pendant. I can alternatively design one for you. I love making these and would love to make yours!

Price: $90

name: custom designed pendant
description:
Customize your own one-of-a-kind pendant! Be that guy or girl that ALWAYS get's the coolest gifts. Or design one for yourself to commemorate a special memory or event. Send me a photograph or graphic. I CAN ALSO DESIGN ONE FOR YOU. Simply e-mail me with your request. I'll send you a photograph of available shapes to choose from. I love making these and would love to make yours!

Some ideas: Graphic initials / portraits / quotes / inside jokes / etc...

Hand-shaped fine porcelain is high fired so each piece is particularly strong. I then print the design (either a photograph or a graphic design) with a special iron-oxide ink. The pendant then goes through its final firing which melts the iron into the white glaze. The design is absolutely permanent and will never scratch off. 

Shipped with a copper jump-ring and a 30" chain. Contact me if you would prefer a shorter chain with a clasp or any other option / embellishment. Can also be gift-wrapped and shipped with a personalized note.

Price for your own design: $130
Price including design work: $150

name: bambooze cups
description:
Get it? ...but you don't have to just drink booze out of these pretty babies. They're also perfect for your morning o.j. Whether or not you put a splash of vodka in there is your business.

Wheel-thrown from dark brown clay then embellished with grey porcelain. Inside is a shiny blue-green glaze. mmmm

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders!

Dimensions: Each is approximately 2.5 x 3.5"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $85 for all 4

Dimensions: From largest to smallest - 7.75" / 7" / 6.5" diameters 

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $130

name: lit #3
description:
Slipcast then hand-altered from a very light grey porcelain, this bottle turned candle-luminaire is made with love. Perfect for adding a sophisticated twinkle anywhere in your home. The entire piece is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's luminescence. Because the high-firing vitrifies the material, this piece wipes clean easily. 


Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $110

name: banded saké 1
description:
It's partay time! And do shots ever go out of style? ... Well yea, kinda when you hit your 30's. BUT, not if you sip saké out of these beauties. So there you have it... buy these for someone who loves saké... or shots.

Wheel-thrown from dark brown clay then embellished with grey porcelain. Inside is ... how do I put this?... THE most amazing glaze ever. It's hard to photograph, but believe me, it makes you feel like your flying over a mercurial celestial body. It appears dark and shiny in a normally lit room, but when the light directly hits, the glaze ignites with amber sparks intertwined with deep pools of indigo. 

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Dimensions: Each is approximately 1.75 x 3"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $80 for all 4

name: lost & found plates
description:
The actual objects depicted on these plates were pressed into dark brown stoneware then tediously inlaid with grey porcelain. Finished with a blue-green glaze known for it's depth of character. Charmingly irregular. A perfect addition to a table in need of a non-factory-made feel.

Use for food or to catch whatever's in your pockets when you walk through the door.

Dimensions: 8.25" diameters  

Food safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $210

name: architectural pendant 2
description:
Hand-shaped fine porcelain was high fired making this pendant particularly strong. I then printed a modern architectural drawing with a special iron-oxide ink. The piece then went through its final firing which melted the iron into the white glaze. The design is absolutely permanent and will never scratch off. 

Shipped with a copper jump-ring and a 30" chain. Contact me if you would prefer a shorter chain with a clasp or any other option / embellishment. 

I can also customize your pendant! (See the "customizable" section of this website for more info.) You send me any image and I'll fire it on your choice of pendant. I can alternatively design one for you. I love making these and would love to make yours!

Price: $95

name: double sided stripe vase
description:
This piece began with the building of a non-ceramic model which was then made into a mold. Then ultra-white fine porcelain is slip cast, the triple-apature top is created and it's high-fired to cone 6. The porcelain vitrifies and becomes non-porous.

This vessel is double sided. One side has been painted with white and gold enamel while the other is completely clean - giving you the option to display it either way. The interior is glazed in a creamy matte-white. All of the castings have slight imperfections and maintain a hand-made feel. 

This is an ongoing series and exploration. Contact me if you would like a specific design. I'm currently working on pop icons using glazes and decals. Stay tuned! 

Beautifully displayed on it's own or use as a vase for your favorite flowers.

Dimensions: 11.25 x 4.25 x 6 inches
Shipped with felt pads to protect furniture

Price: $250

name: banded tumblers
description:

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $95 for all 4

name: radial platter
description:
This serving platter is hand-built from a slab of dark brown stoneware then tediously inlaid with fine porcelain of white and grey. A creamy riverside white pools in the middle. Charmingly irregular. A perfect addition to a table in need of a non-factory-made feel. 

A beautiful display piece or ideal for fruit, cheeses or olives. 

Dimensions: 9.75" wide and 11" diagonal 

Food safe / Hand-washing recommended

description:

description:

description:

Would look handsome on a bedside table for water. Hearty enough for everyday use.

Dimensions: 3 x 5.5", 2.75 x 5.5"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $65 for the pair

name: beak carafe & tumblers
description:
This striking set is half wheel-thrown/ half hand-built. Half straight line / half curved. Half clear glaze / half grey. The two matching tumbles feel like they just belong in your hand with a place for all your fingers to rest.

A beautiful bedside table accessory for water, or fill with juice at breakfast. Hell, use it for wine!

Dimensions: Carafe - 9 x 5.5" Tumblers - 4.25 x 3.25"

Food safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $275

name: lit #1
description:
Slipcast then hand-altered from ultra white fine porcelain, this bottle turned candle-luminaire is made with love. Perfect for adding a sophisticated twinkle anywhere in the home. The entire piece is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's luminescence. Because the high-firing vitrifies the material, this piece wipes clean easily. 


Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Price: $110

name: stumble #3
description:
Slipcast then hand-distorted from ultra white fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed matte-white. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurement: 8.25 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $160

name: almost argyle bowl 3
description:
Wheel-thrown from speckled stoneware.The outside is hand-drawn with a glaze pencil. The robin's egg glaze is perfectly suited to bring out the clay's natural speckled look.

This bowl would be stunning on a table to hold fruit or a side dish. ...and I'm not talking "almost" stunning. 

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Dimensions: 9.5" diameter x 4.5" high

Price: $140

name: almost argyle bowl 2
description:
Do you almost like to eat your cereal out of a trough? Then this is the perfect sized "almost argyle" bowl for you. I mean, this is the perfect size for MY cereal habit. It's also a beautiful bowl to display fruit or a side-dish at dinner time.

Wheel-thrown from speckled stoneware then the outside is hand-drawn with a glaze pencil. The ever-creamy riverside white glaze is perfectly suited to bring out the clay's natural speckled look.

Hearty enough for everyday use. Contact me for special orders.

Dimensions: 8" diameter x 4" high

Price: $120

name: swirly cups 1

name: textured tumblers
description:
These stoneware tumblers are wheel-thrown then embellished with porcelain slip. The dimensional texture of the slip makes holding these a tactile and unique experience. They are graduated in height.

Hearty enough for everyday use.

Dimensions (smallest to largest): 2.75 x 3.75" / 2.865 x 4.25" / 2.5 x 4.5" / 2 x 4.75"

Food safe / Dishwasher safe

Price: $100 for the set

name: spinroom #2
description:
Slipcast from fine porcelain, this bottle is one-of-a-kind. The entrancing liquid-pour pattern is an effect caused by swirling together white and grey-tinted porcelain at precise moments during the casting process. Each one is a surprise and I truly love making them! The exterior is left unglazed to show off the porcelain's creamy luminescence. The interior is glazed clear gloss. 

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $150

name: gimme #2
description:
Slipcast from ultra white fine porcelain, bottles in the Gimme collection are marked by a free-form glazing technique. This particular piece has visible seams exposing the casting process. One side appears vaguely human while the other spills a ribbon of matte-white glaze over the bottle's rim.

A beautiful display piece on it's own or fill it with sake, whiskey, bourbon, or scotch to accompany your next meal. This piece also makes a unique gift for those who love design.

Measurements: 8.5 x 4 x 2.5 inches

Food-safe / Hand-washing recommended

Price: $140

name: almost argyle bowl
description:
Wheel-thrown stoneware. The outside of this large bowl was hand-drawn with a glaze pencil and then wax resist was painted in the non-glazed areas. A dark matte-brown fills in the rest and the inside is glazed a shiny grey. I would call this piece handsome if pressed for one adjective. Yup, a handsome 38 year old man with just the right amount of facial hair. Le sigh.

You can use this bowl for mixing cupcake batter for the children you've never had or for cat food. Also makes a lovely fruit bowl.

Dimensions: 8.75" diameter x 6.5" high

Price: $180

name: pharos platter
description:
